Text: Outrage porn refers to any type of media that is designed to invoke outrage for the purpose getting traffic or attention online.

Text: Outrage porn:  The term "outrage porn" was coined by political cartoonist and essayist Tim Kreider of The "New York Times".

Text: Outrage porn:  Coined in 2009, the term was later popularized by author and "Observer" media critic Ryan Holiday.
